meanings.definition: A type of organic compound containing the amidine functional group.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of amidines in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained that amidines are commonly used in certain medications.
meanings.sent3: The amidines at the party were the molecules that everyone wanted to bond with.
meanings.sent4: In the world of organic compounds, amidines stand out like bright stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to illustrate the structure of amidines to the students.

meanings.sent1: The shelves in the lab were filled with various chemicals, including amidines.
meanings.sent2: The researchers needed to order more supplies, including additional amidines.
meanings.sent3: The amidines on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The amidines in the container were like a bustling community of molecules.
meanings.sent5: The students observed the different properties of amidines under the microscope.
